entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLDER WITH LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS 15 TO 20
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
